svg.title: Comparison gender life expectancy WHO-2019
svg.desc: Comparison of federal subjects of Russia by life expectancy at birth according to data of Rosstat. Data for life expectancy: https://rosstat.gov.ru/folder/210/document/13207, https://www.fedstat.ru/indicator/31293. Data for number of population: https://rosstat.gov.ru/folder/12781, https://rosstat.gov.ru/storage/mediabank/Popul_Comp2022_site.xls. Code of the program for creation of this chart: https://github.com/Lady3mlnm/Mini-programs-for-calculation-of-life-expectancy-in-countries/tree/main/SVG-diagrams-Russia.

g.text: Life expectancy at birth in urban area
Life expectancy at birth in rural area
